pullRequest.title: CLDR-14251 Modernize: eliminate ajax_status.jsp
pullRequest.bodyText:
-Move most of ajax_status.jsp to SurveyAjax.includeJavaScript, converting jsp to java
-New CldrStatus.js to encapsulate data like surveyRunningStamp on front end with getters/setters
-TEMPORARY SurveyAjax.includeEvilJavaScript for items not yet handled by CldrStatus.js
-Extend statusJSON to include contextPath
-Remove unused front-end variables surveyCurrentLocaleStamp, surveyCurrentLocaleStampId, etc.
-Remove dead code; clean up
-Comments

Checklist

 Issue filed: https://unicode-org.atlassian.net/browse/CLDR-14251
 Updated PR title and link in previous line to include Issue number

commit.message:
CLDR-14251 Modernize: eliminate ajax_status.jsp

-Move most of ajax_status.jsp to SurveyAjax.includeJavaScript, converting jsp to java

-New CldrStatus.js to encapsulate data like surveyRunningStamp on front end with getters/setters

-TEMPORARY SurveyAjax.includeEvilJavaScript for items not yet handled by CldrStatus.js

-Extend statusJSON to include contextPath

-Remove unused front-end variables surveyCurrentLocaleStamp, surveyCurrentLocaleStampId, etc.

-Remove dead code; clean up

-Remove two ancient .DS_Store files that should never have been added to git

-Comments

nodes.bodyText: All the whitespace changed in this file, but the only substantial difference is contextPath changed to cldrStatus.getContextPath()
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,204 +1,202 @@
-/**
- * Special module that shows a users page.

nodes.bodyText: Oops WHAT_GETROW is accidentally duplicated here. It's harmless but I'll remove it in the next PR.
I wonder if these r instances should be hoisted up, since they are almost always used.  BUt, not really important.
these WHAT_ things shouldn't need to be communicated to the client… hard coded would be fine. But no reason to change it now.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -203,12 +213,18 @@ if(false) { // if we need to redirect for some reason..
 <meta name="gigabot" content="nofollow">
 <link rel="stylesheet" href="<%=request.getContextPath()%>/surveytool.css" />
 <link rel="stylesheet" href="<%=request.getContextPath()%>/css/CldrStForum.css" />
-<%
-	// TODO: when v.jsp includes ajax_status.jsp, avoid redundant links for bootstrap, surveytool.css, redesign.css
-	// Note that ajax_status.jsp now reliably should output the surveyUser, so we don't need
-	// to output it again here.
-%>
-<%@include file="/WEB-INF/tmpl/ajax_status.jsp" %>
+
+<link rel="stylesheet" href="//ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/dojo/1.14.1/dijit/themes/claro/claro.css" />

nodes.bodyText: oh, this is an old fix… thanks!

nodes.bodyText: These are instructions to someone maintaining this as to how to add a new webfont, such as done for Myanmar
